alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 3:16AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 inches or more are possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Northern Wayne and Wyoming counties. In New York, Chemung, Chenango, Otsego, Tioga, Broome and Delaware counties. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures start off in the 30s Friday night, but are then forecast to fall through the 20s during the day on Saturday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga
